name: GuardDog
0:
”Alexa, open Guard Dog”
”Alexa, start Guard Dog”
”Alexa, launch Guard Dog”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guard dog
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Guard Dog: An ultra-realistic audio criminal deterrent to safe guard your home when you leave it unattended. Guard Dog will make thieves think twice about entering your home with our guard dog security.

Stay safe, activate Guard Dog and relax knowing that Guard dog is protecting your home.

The dog sounds are custom made and all sound alike – after all, nobody will believe 20 different dogs live in the same home, right? 

VoiceXpert even recorded sounds of dogs running on different flooring to really fool a criminal in to thinking large fierce dogs are ready to attack and defend their home.

This is the official Guard Dog skill, crafted by VoiceXpert.


Instructions:

To launch Guard Dog, say “Alexa, open Guard Dog.” It’s really easy to get started, once you open this Alexa skill, it will command Angus to patrol your home, so it’s safe and secure when you leave.

To stop Angus from patrolling simply say “Alexa, stop.”


Premium Membership – Full Home Security:

-> Get instant access to 100% increase in audio quality (320Kbps).

-> Enhanced looping with no annoying sound gaps.


Feedback & Requests:

We really want to help you feel safe and sound knowing that Guard Dog is a great way to deter criminals. If you have any suggestions, feedback, or wish to request a new feature, please email info@voicexpert.co.uk.

Help Us, Help You:

The VoiceXpert team have literally spent hours carefully crafting this Alexa skill. We have a passion for helping people.

We would really love a review to help us improve Guard Dog and other future skills we develop.

Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
